titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to collect information under Medicare, Medicaid, and the Children's Health Insurance Program related to social determinants of health, and for other purposes.
UNDERSTAND Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
